title: Moments of the runner
creator_credit: Marlin Darrah Films, Runners World Magazine and Marlin Darrah
brief_description: Examines five of America’s most popular long-distance running competitions: Boston, New York, Chicage, Eugene and the Bay to Breakers. Includes a historical overview with scenes of Moscow, Greece, San Francisco and describes the diversity of people who take up running.
creator_credit_for_label: Marlin Darrah Films, Runners World Magazine and Marlin Darrah
